meanings.definition: A type of pasta dish typically filled with meat or cheese.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed the delicious cannelons filled with cheese at the Italian restaurant.
meanings.sent2: The cannelons were served hot and gooey, oozing with melted cheese.
meanings.sent3: The cannelons decided to have a cheese party inside the oven!
meanings.sent4: The cannelons stood tall on the plate, like cheesy soldiers ready for battle.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the bubbling cheese in the cannelons filled the room.

meanings.definition: A cylindrical shape or tube used in cooking.
meanings.sent1: The chef used a cannelon to shape the dough into a perfect tube.
meanings.sent2: The cannelon was filled with the delicious meat mixture before baking.
meanings.sent3: The cannelon rolled off the counter and bounced across the kitchen floor!
meanings.sent4: The cannelon served as a tunnel for the sauce to flow through.
meanings.sent5: The shiny cannelon gleamed under the kitchen lights.
